name: Adam Aucoin Final Build 4
description:
Psycho

Your mother, Mrs. Bates has killed Marion Crane and hidden the murder weapon somewhere near the Bates Home. Retrieve the murder weapon using Q and dispose of it in the swamp behind the motel without being caught by the two police officers that are hot on your trail. Navigate the map with the directional keys. And remember “We all go a little mad sometimes.”
